product_name: CamelBak Day Star Hydration Pack - 70 fl. oz. - Women's
long_description: The women's CamelBak Day Star Hydration Pack offers a sleek, gender-specific fit and comfort while letting you hydrate easily during active pursuits. 70 fl. oz. Antidote(TM) reservoir features a welded center baffle and a low-profile shape for stability. Hydration compartment loads easily, holding the reservoir flat against your back to leave more room for layers and gear. Wide-mouth port makes it easy to fill and clean the reservoir; quick-snap cap tightens in just a quarter turn. Folding arms lock into position to hold the reservoir open when drying; arms tuck out of the way around the port when not in use. S-curve harness with diamond mesh follows the shape of a woman's body, fits shorter torsos and maximizes load stability. Back panel with air-mesh enhances ventilation across the back. The CamelBak Day Star Hydration Pack is roomy enough for snacks and essentials for 2 to 3 hrs. on the trail.
short_description: The women's CamelBak Day Star Hydration Pack offers a sleek, gender-specific fit and comfort while letting you hydrate easily during active pursuits.
